inn1.comm: and beaten first up, Roach gets the angle going across, pitched outside leg, good length, and past the edge just outside off
bounce now, banged in short of a length, Tharanga pulls bat inside the line
on the pads now, good length, but cannot nudge it past midwicket
now he goes pushing at one angled across couple of feet outside off, and is beaten by several inches
bowled much fuller, patted back down the pitch, Roach parries it to mid off
right on off stump, good length, played out with an angled face to covers
slight away movement from a length, Mahela knocks it away to point
pitched up and angled in, he eases this with the wrists past midwicket's dive, it slows down in the rather dense outfield near the rope
Tharanga having issues outside off early, not for the first time, pulls the bat inside the line late after prodding at a length ball
better, takes a step forward and shoulders arms to a similar delivery
this held its line close to off from good length but Tharanga had already flagged it through
went to play at this one, it straightened into him again, and a thick inside edge dribbled to midwicket
dug in short from wide of the crease, arrives outside off, Mahela brings it down safely
good length now, angled in again, he plays it out behind point, slightly hesitant to push forward
neatly done, gets forward and opens the face at the same time to pick up one to third man
good length, ending on middle stump after pitching outside leg, nudged to the on side
bouncer, Tharanga spots it a touch late but crouches and gets out of the way safely, just in time
the follow up ball is full outside off for the drive, Tharanga does not lunge at it, he opens the face and times it past point
hurries on from that awkward in-between length, thick inside edge onto pad for Mahela
and again, another one skids on, comes in too slightly, Mahela inside edges it in the air square to leg
length ball steered down to third man
goes flailing at this wide one that swings away sharply, Ramdin takes it in front of first slip
pitched up just outside off, straightish now, knocked to midwicket
there is bounce from a good length for Rampaul, but Mahela's softly dropped it in front of cover and retained strike
in with Roach's big angle from wide of the crease, defended

Mahela goes after this one, a step or two down and wants to launch this down the ground, not a clean hit by any means, but lots on it to clear mid off, Charles is after it, but his dive is not enough to save four, seems to have touched it
across to defend a climbing delivery
lovely, overpitched and Mahela uses the angle to will it between mid on and midwicket, elegance, balance, all that
and again, goes finer, but midwicket is able to cut it off
still finer, and turns it in the air through square leg , this may not be a bad toss to lose
too wide is Rampaul on the outswinger and Mahela crashes it to the deep cover boundary
stays back on this just-short-of-driving-length ball and carves it to point who takes pace off it
just outside off, good length, no swing, Tharanga leaves
all bat and no feet mean Tharanga is beaten on a loose push to a pitched up ball
opens the face and runs this length ball to point
short of a length now, dropped towards the covers
Mahela is using Roach's incoming angle to pick runs on the leg side, here's a nudge behind square this time
another loose drive from Tharanga, thick edge eludes the cordon, past third slip's dive
picture-perfect, Roach overpitches, Mahela eases forward, pings the deep extra cover rope and holds the followthrough
played out square to the leg side
uncertain this time, but still picks up four more, hurried into him with the angle, he was late in coming forward, thick inside edge runs past short fine
overpitched, Tharanga pushes softly to extra cover
short, wide, and Tharanga cuts hard, third man gets around
digs it in too short around leg stump, batsman ducks
back of a length, around off stump, pushed to covers
short and wide again, third man is square, though, and gets to the cut
straightish length ball outside off left alone
zippy length ball not far from off stump, Tharanga leaves
pushes forward and gets it past short extra, but mid off runs around
wants to punch off the back foot but there is much bounce and he knocks it to short extra cover
gets him to drive, on the bounce to short extra cover who parries it towards mid off
widish length ball steered to third man
comes out but is cramped for the cut and hits it to point
short of a length, knocked down into the pitch
pacy stuff on middle stump, 138.1 kph, Mahela is cramped for room, and hurried, defends it down the pitch
they take on Pollard at backward point for a sharp single, throw misses at the striker's, Tharanga was home anyway
Tharanga is edging boundaries again, flays at an overpitched one from the crease, there is only one slip now, and Tharanga has four more through vacant second slip
good length, played out to point from the crease
wants the single with a push towards cover, but is sent back in time
good length outside off, dabs it behind point for one
runs a good length ball to point
drives off the middle this time, but little Bravo denies him with a dive at point
hint of inward shape from a length, nudged to the leg side
worked behind square leg
tries the short ball, no venom, not much bounce, dragged through midwicket
skiddy length ball, gives some width and is punched firmly off the back foot, past point's dive, but slows down near the rope on a sluggish outfield and is pulled back
length ball steered to third man
short and climbing sharply wide outside off, Tharanga reaches out and chops it down for one
leans right forward and blocks to extra cover
mid on is not exactly haring forward to pick up this push and it is an easy single for Mahela in the end, Bravo is surprised at the tame effort
he edges once more as he tries to steer this, falls short of Gayle at wide slip
moves forward and wants to whip this one to the leg side, not quite the length for that shot, and it is in the air for a while, but safely short of midwicket
moves across but fails to nudge it to leg, Sammy is quick on the ball and Mahela has to get back
pitched up and eased down to long on softly
Mahela is too far up the pitch for an attempted single, Tharanga's push has gone quickly to mid off, and the throw hits direct, but Mahela has made it back in time
shortish, he wants to pull, but ends up underedging onto the pitch
widish, he runs this wide of third man

there comes the first wicket! It was a short of length delivery angling across the left hander, Tharanga chooses to throw his bat at that without moving his feet and pays the price as he gets a feather on that one. It settles in keeper's gloves at a nice comfortable height
he leaves the first delivery as it is wide outside off
this time the bowler correct the line and bowls length on the stumps, Sanga shuffles across and defends it to the leg side
bowls a fuller delivery wide outside off, Sanga lets it go through
he comes forward to this length delivery outside off and creams it to deep extra cover as sweetly as only he can
he comes forward and blocks the length delivery to the off side
he comes forward and pushes the length delivery to long on for an easy single
he uses his feet and pushes the ball softly to midwicket for a quick single
slightly slower, the batsman waits on the front foot and taps it softly towards square leg for another quick single
he waits for this length delivery outside off and opens the face late to run it down to third man
length delivery, Mahela solidly defends it off the front foot
short of length outside off, the batsman guides it to third man for a single
full delivery driven to deep midwicket
takes on a pitched up delivery and flashes it down to sweeper cover
he's played this so well today, moves slightly across and turns it off the pad through midwicket
overpitched, further down the pads, and Mahela needs no more invitation, flicks to the right of short fine leg
loopy full slower one pushed down to long off
back of a length, some way outside off, Sanga lets it go
pitched up, Mahela cannot get any timing on the drive for once, down to mid off
charges out now and tries to go over the bowler, there is a short mid on, the mishit clears him, and rolls to long on
leans right forward, but he too mistimes the drive, to short extra
wider full delivery, and Sanga has connected nicely with the drive, but he's picked out short extra again
walks out to a back of a length ball just outside off, and knocks it to the large vacant spaces on the leg side
line is down the leg side and Mahela turns it fine, man gets to it in the deep
full delivery pushed to mid on
Mahela gets to a fluent fifty with a reverse sweep to a tossed up overpitched ball outside off, wide of the slip
flighted offspinner nudged to the leg side

given right away, Mahela turns back immediately as well, Narine strikes in his first over, tossed up offspinner, Mahela hesitantly forward to try and defend, inside edge, onto pad, and pops up for Ramdin to take a dolly, what a huge strike, he was purring along, Mahela
drives awkwardly first ball to a flighted one, to mid off
Sanga flashes outside off now, in the air and down to third man without further damage to the visitors
length ball punched to mid on
pushed to extra cover
forward to drive without much power to extra cover
short of driving length, knocked in front of point
straight length ball on off stump, he mistimes a drive to the bowler
stays back to a length ball that comes on slowly and works it to midwicket
steers an offspinner to backward point
fullish offspinner, he goes for the sweep and a top edge flies fine to the leg side boundary
quicker offspinner now, he comes across and forward and awkwawrdly nudges fine down leg, skidded onto him
pushes a pitched up offspinner to vacant point for one
turned with the slight spin to square leg
comes forward to a good length ball and pushes to extra cover
flashes hard at a short and wide ball, but is not in a great position and misses
cuts a widish one past point, the sweeper keeps them to two
Sanga swivels to a short ball and pulls, hasn't timed it but got it well over midwicket
wide one cut hard behind point, no stopping that
comes forward and turns it with the spin behind square
Chandimal wanted the single, point threw but missed, Chandimal would have been in trouble
leaves a sharp offspinner alone outside off
forward to defend a fuller one to the leg side
Narine has removed the big guns, Sanga has loosely pushed this flighted delivery straight to extra cover, just pushed firmly at it from the crease without leaning out
right on off stump with a pitched up ball, pushed to mid off
sharp back of a length ball jabbed to backward point
drives an overpitched ball but mid off gets around to it
too full again, eased between extra cover and mid off
goes back awkwardly deep in the crease to knock a short of a length ball, that does not rise too much, to fine leg
tries to cut one that is too close to him, and is beaten, lots of bounce too
quick length ball outside off, Mathews goes back and steers it to the vacant third man rope
tossed up full, pushed back
straightens on off stump now, he plays it late, softly defending off the front foot to the off side
thick inside edge flies past backward short leg as Mathews nudges off the back foot
tossed up on middle and leg, defended to forward short leg
overpitched and angled in to leg, softly turned to midwicket
too full again from Roach, on middle, pushed down to mid on
again a shortish ball not bouncing all that much, steered to third man
dropped, straight to Gayle at lone slip and straight out of his hands, good length ball bouncing outside off, Mathews pushing at it from deep in the crease, and getting away
behind the line this time to block a similar delivery
Roach overpitches now, and Mathews replies with a stinging drive past mid off
drags a top-edge off an attempted sweep to the right of short fine leg
has him pushing at a tossed up ball, thick inside edge to midwicket
forward to turn a flighted ball to midwicket
quicker and fuller on middle and leg, to midwicket again
late in coming forward but pushes safely to extra cover
Roach angles it into the thigh pad, and Mathews hops to nudge it past the keeper
short and widish at 137.9 kph, Mathews is beaten on the cut by the pace and bounce
pitches it full and wide, Mathews helps it over extra cover
good length ball, 139.3 kph, punched to extra cover
full on off stump, Mathews leans out to block
leading edge along the ground to extra cover, he tried to turn it to leg with the angle
full dart, pushed to long on
loopy full toss patted to long on
floated full down the leg side
forces an ovrepitched ball down the track to the bowler
leans across and turns a full delivery to midwicket
some timing this, gets under a full delivery and lifts it straight and high with a big followthrough, carries all the way
full on leg stump, pushed to midwicket
drives without much timing to extra cover
punches this length ball to the leg side but midwicket runs across and prevents the run
punched through covers for a couple
stays in the crease and turns it straight to midwicket
leans forward to push a length ball around off to extra cover
bounce for Samuels as Chandimal gets forward and inside edges behind square on leg
quicker and fuller, thick inside edge to short fine leg as he pushes forward
stays back and steers against the slight turn to point
turned to midwicket
straighter one, quick again, punched off the back foot down the track
that was fast, that zoomed through past Mathews' flail outside off, umpire Gould smiles at the bowler
good length ball turned through square leg
short outside off, he drags the pull off the toe end to deep midwicket
pushes a good length ball to extra cover
slight inward shape from a good length, pushed off the front foot to long on

hello, that was nasty from the medium-pacer, this short ball reared up at Mathews, who got himself in a tangle and crouched and fended at the same time, fell short of the keeper in front of the vacant slip cordon
pushed down the track
they are falling, softly but surely, now Chandimal picks out midwicket, leaning out and casually turning a full offbreak to the fielder
leaves this alone outside off stump, was not far away
pushes a full one to mid off
turned to deep square leg
nudged to square leg with the turn
goes across in the crease to a fast offspinner but cannot work it away
appeal for caught behind, bowler implores the umpire, Thirimanne across and prodding at a length ball leaving him with the angle, Sammy was absolutely convinced, did not seem to be an edge on replays
extra cover dives and keeps Thirimanne on strike
tries to drive an overpitched one, off the inner part of the blade towards mid on
waits and chops a back of a length ball to point
Thirimanne breaks free, stays around the crease and launches a good length ball over mid off
plays out a good length ball to point and Sammy has bowled out without giving away much
defended off the front foot
forward to defend again
he presses forward to one outside off
plays out a tossed up quickish ball to point
stays back to a length offbreak and thick edges to point
knocks a full delivery to long on
pats an overpitched ball on off down the pitch, bowler gets to his left to field
good length ball driven out to the sweeper
comes in slightly from a length, pushed past midwicket for a single
what a ripper, angled in good length from round the stumps, holds the line and bounces past the outside edge
angled in good length around off, pushed to the bowler
floats it down the leg side first up
backs away to the leg side, leaves the crease, heaves at a short ball, and is beaten
slower one straightening on off stump, softly pushed for a single to cover
and Thirimanne picks out the man in the deep, makes room outside leg, gets under a full delivery - an offcutter - and lofts it high and straight to long off
angles this down the leg side
defends a back of a length ball down the track
sharp bouncer, right on off stump, Kula pulls his head inside the line
overpitched and angled down the pads, whipped to deep square
helps a short of a length ball to deep square
slower one around off, turned in front of square leg, and they will come back for two
good length and skiddy on leg stump, turned to midwicket
slower full toss worked past midwicket
another slow full delivery worked to deep forward square
mishits a slog off a back of a length ball to mid on

Pollard takes the top edge on the deep square leg boundary, Kula leans back and goes for the pull to a bouncer dug into him, Pollard runs to his right and settles under it, takes it with the top of his fingers, but safely in the end
a slower length ball, he backs away to leg and stabs it to short third man, non-striker is half way out, and has to hurry back
turned to fine leg
lets a good length ball go outside off
goes across and defends a short of a length ball to extra cover
short ball not getting up much, he drags the pull out to deep midwicket
busy player, this Mendis, walks out and swings a short ball down to fine leg
slower one on off and middle, nudged square
lovely, he bowled another one earlier, angled in, round the stumps, good length, and holds its line to beat the outside edge by a few inches, super
hint of straightening again, he runs it behind point for a single
yet another slower one, Mathews pushes forward and it is in the air for quite a while as it goes down to long on
nudged to square leg
goes hard at a reverse sweep, the offspinner turns in sharply and carries fine down the leg side
bouncing offspinner, defended down the pitch
goes back and punches a good length offspinner, there is no one sweeping on the off side
pitches it up now, defended off the front foot
spins in to middle and leg, he works it straight to backward square leg
this one swings away from a good length, beats the outside edge
pushes a length ball to extra cover
flays an overpitched ball wide of the sweeper
goes hard at a pitched up ball, hits it to mid off
bouncer around off stump, he goes down under it
gets on his toes to steer a short of a length ball to third man
Narine takes another one, Mendis hits the sweep hard against the turn, but also in the air, and straight to deep square leg
defends a tossed up ball on off to midwicket
moves across and nudges off the leg stump, fine leg gets around
pushes a good length ball to cover
works an offspinner straight to square leg
gets across outside off and paddles to fine leg to keep the strike
a tame short delivery first up and Mathews whacks a mishit pull to the deep midwicket boundary
works a length ball off middle to deep midwicket
Herath pulls in his own style, it falls short of midwicket diving to his right
tries to swipe-cut a short and wide one but is beaten
gets hold of the cut, but there is a sweeper in place
backs away outside leg, Rampaul follows him with a short ball that does not rise much, Mathews gets it away to fine leg
tossed up full outside off, pushed wide of extra cover and he takes the single first ball
and Herath takes a step out to stylishly leave one outside off
tries to sweep one spinning away on off, misses and is hit on the pad
quicker offspinner, draws him forward and beats the push
full on the stumps, he swats a powerful sweep out to deep square
Mathews will be off strike, tries to cut but is beaten by a bouncing offspinner
another one down, Herath swings a good length delivery tamely to mid off
a bouncer arrives, Malinga gets head out of the way
competently defends a short of a length ball to the bowler
hit on the right upper arm as he tries to move inside the line of a short ball
length ball, he works to deep square leg for a single
Malinga turns this off the pads to fine leg but they don't take the single
pushes a full delivery to long on and refuses the single
nudges another full ball to square leg
quick and good length on off, blocked
straighter one on off stump, defended again
can't do anything with this one, turn and bounce, hits him and runs to short third man
keeps strikes and reaches fifty as he gets something on the paddle, he was dropped early on but has held his own amid all the wickets
works a full delivery to midwicket and gets off strike first ball
slower one from round the stumps, runs it to point
has a swipe at a very short, short ball, fielder in the deep at midwicket is late and gets to it on the bounce
now Mathews goes in the air over midwicket, but wide and short of Samuels again
allows a bouncer to angle across from round the stumps
sweeps from outside off stump, wide of deep square, but they are kept to one in the end
Mathews shielded Malinga for an entire over from Narine, he gets one ball now against him and smashes it over wide long off
the other one follows from Narine, pitches leg, spins away and hits Malinga plumb in front, didn't look as plumb on replays, lots of bounce, but ball tracker has it clipping top of off
gets bat in front of pad to defend to midwicket
right forward outside off to defend a full delivery
straighter one, he goes back and a thick edge runs past slip
overpitched on the pads worked to deep square leg
belated decision to play this one outside off, ends up dabbing it to wide slip
and this time he's steered it straight to that man, Bravo digging it short from round the stumps, and Ajantha precision-guided it to wide slip

inn2.comm: full and some inswing on the stumps, Gayle is away with a sharp single in front of midwicket
slight away swing, full delivery patted to extra cover
outswinger, good length, left alone
forward to defend a good length ball around off
pitched up, hint of straightening, blocked with a slightly open face towards point
good length ball played out to mid on
angled across first up from Kula, some away swing takes it further away, Gayle reaches forward to drive through the covers
that started outside leg and jagged across the left-hander, a surprised Gayle controlled it well in the end, running it to point
forward to push a pitched up away swinger to mid off, not too much swing
right on middle stump, pushed back
down the pads, and it threatens to run fine but Sanga has it covered with a lunge
good length ball punched from the crease to mid off
straigitish length ball pushed hard to mid off
shortish and he sends it screaming down to fine leg with an eager pull
leg side and full, Gayle happily tucks it past square leg
awkward bounce from short of driving length, Gayle takes a hand off the bat handle as he defends
slower one, Gayle decides to let it go in the end after appearing to play at it, bounces in front of Sanga and goes through him
slower one on off stump, played out to point
big inswing now from Kula, hits the pad but above the knee roll, too high
tries to swat this inswinger through midwicket, but misses, takes it high on the pad again
better, respects the inswinger and plays it out softly to the off side
drives an overpitched ball to mid off
again lots of inswing, Charles cannot work it square on the leg side
gets forward, big gap between bat and pad, thick inside edge hits pad and rolls away on off
driven first ball to mid off
tries to drive again, it turns in and a thick inside edge goes to midwicket
uncertainly lunges forward and defends with a thick inside edge to the leg side
worked off the pad to square leg
gets forward and tucks past midwicket's dive
too full into the pads, nudged to fine leg
Kula continues to move it in, Charles defends off the front foot
dropped, he tried swatting with the inswing over midwicket in Kula's last over too, does so again, and hits it into the fielder, but Mathews makes a mess of this one
down to third man, looked set to go over when Ajantha came sprawling across and saved three
right on middle stump, good length ball defended tightly
hits the pads down the leg side and rolls to fine leg
tries to drive but the inswing takes the inner part of the bat and the ball goes to midwicket
hint of straightening after it starts across outside off, left alone
tries to sweep but misses and takes it on the pad
this has been a good over so far, but this one is too full on middle and Gayle's instantly smoked it straight over the bowler
pushed past extra cover for a single
had no clue, was hit high on the pad as this one angled in to leg
pitched up delivery defended with a forward lunge
slightly short, and Gayle's picked it over mid on, did not hit it off the middle, but he has too much power
skips down the track now, and is beaten by the swing away from him, that wasn't far from off stump too
stabs this short of a good length ball down to mid off as he takes a hand off the bat
holy smokin' that came out of nowhere, length ball on off and middle, Gayle's leaned out and lifted it way over deep midwicket
another one, now he lifts a length ball over wide long off, immense power, massive reach, maximum effect
flighted into the pads with leg slip waiting, nudged away
worked to midwicket
plays outside the line as this flighted one spins in outside off
tossed up, spins in, hits the pad below the knee roll but umpire Gould is not convinced, ball tracker has it clipping leg stump, marginal call
not convincing at all from Charles, swipes a mishit down to long on
mistimes a forcing drive to extra cover
goes too hard at another drive and finds extra cover again
this goes wrong for Malinga, ends up as a loopy high full toss way down the leg side
tries the yorker, some inswing, ends up as a very low full toss, Charles clips it to midwicket
he keeps finding the field, this is a serious crawl now from Charles, he's cracked one straight to mid off and has had to get back quickly in his crease as the throw comes in
digs out a very full one down to long on
one ball he has in the over, and that one ball, a slow full one, has been smeared past a helpless mid off, what a man
good length and angled in on off, defended
goes after a slower one, cannot connect, on the bounce to the keeper
Charles gets off strike with a nudged single in the air to square leg
plays out a length ball on middle and leg to mid off
bit late coming down on this pitched up ball on leg, knocks it square in the end
he has some width outside off but his steer is straight to backward point, it is one of those days for Charles, everything is going to the fielders
keeps out a good length ball on the stumps
plays out a length ball to extra cover from the crease
tried the yorker, almost pinged Gayle on the boot, just carried down the leg side
whoa, 144.1 kph bouncer, Gayle swivels, hooks and the top-edge flies fine for six, Malinga smiles
a yorker, pinpoint, precise yorker on leg and middle stump, Gayle's left foot is in the air and the bat denies Malinga
another yorker, on leg stump, Gayle manages to dig it out down the ground to long off
pitched up but on the pads, nudged fine
bouncer angled in, Charles ducks
Charles gets another run with a swat to deep square leg
extra effort on the bouncer from Mathews, Gayle pulls out of the shot in the end
pitched up ball pushed down to long off
good length ball defended tightly to the off side
swipes a tossed up ball to midwicket
bat in front of pad to push down the track
shortish one punched down to long off
he sweeps now from outside off for one to fine leg
pitched up ball pushed down to long off
Mendis is disgusted that another lbw appeal has been turned down, this flighted ball pitched full and turned in, probably doing too much, hit him in front of middle, ball tracker has it hitting leg
punched to long off
now he plays a rather loose and weak drive and misses outside off
can't put bat to ball at all, short ball going down leg, he misses it again as he tries to pull
dribbles square on leg off the pad
Gayle tries a heave, and a thick inside edge races to the fine leg boundary, Gayle soaks in the applause at his home ground for an entertaining fifty
all working for Gayle, this is a leading edge, it is airborne for a while but it has cleared extra cover quite easily
reaches out and squeezes a drive to wide long off
he tries leaving the crease but gets too close and hits it to the bowler
a mess he is at the moment, this spins in and he lets it strike him cluelessly
hello, Charles wakes up off his 45th ball, dances out and smokes Mendis with the turn over wide long on
heaves a slog-sweep off an under edge to fine leg
angles it quick down the leg side, Gayle misses the sweep, Sanga the take
comes forward, allows it to come on, and chops it very late on the bounce to slip who takes pace off it
Gayle continues to banish them out of sight, shortish at Mathews' pace, and he casually swats it over midwicket
and then he awkwardly keeps out a length ball in Gayle fashion, after ruling out the possibility of an aggressive stroke
then he comes out, makes some room outside leg, and slices over cover for more runs, all happening
lots of width on the length ball and he scythes it to the sweeper
Charles, meanwhile, comes forward and pushes softly to extra cover
whoa, this took off from just back of a good length, surprising and beating Charles' prod
tossed up on middle and off, blocked off the front foot
quick and angled in, Gayle nudges it fine off the pad
nice, angled in, good length, bounces and straightens, Gayle holds bat inside the line
pushes towards point for a sharp single, throw misses at non-striker's
plays out an angled length delivery close to the pitch
another one bounces and hits Charles high on the pad on the forward push
tossed up on middle and leg, defended
stays back to a flighted ball and awkwardly stabs it away outside off
tossed up full on the pads, was the carrom ball, worked in front of square leg
straightens just outside off, defended
makes some room outside leg, Herath follows him, but Charles blasts the full ball over the non-striker
hit to long off
Charles is looking rather busy suddenly, backs away to leg again, and swipes to deep midwicket
Gayle stands in the crease and  places a length ball between the non-striker and his stumps, to long off
moves around in the crease, then shuffles across and paddles it on the bounce to fine leg
dead straight, Gayle moves outside leg and cracks a length ball in front of the sightscreen
this is outside off, he reaches out and mishits a slog to long on
waits for a good length ball to arrive and works it to long on
here comes Charles now, inside the line, to the pitch and lifts it over long off, wide of the man

Charles ends on a strike-rate of 50, Herath switches over the stumps and tosses it up around leg, Charles makes room and gets on the knee for a slog, and Mahela makes no mistake, running in from long on to take the top edge
pushed back to the bowler
down the pads and worked to deep backward square leg
beaten first ball as he comes forward outside off
bat in front of pad to keep out one full on middle
deft touch from Gayle, opens the face to a pitched up widish  ball and guides it between short third and point
acrobatic, left leg high in the air as he whips to midwicket
slanted too wide across Gayle but it is not called one, strange
overpitched outside off, driven to long off
drives out to cover on the edge of the circle
lovely, pitches just back of a good length and moves across to beat the left-hander
swung off the pads on the bounce to deep midwicket
whips a tossed up ball down to long on
forced powerfully straight through the bowlers' hands, and there's no stopping that in the deep
straight again, but this time he goes hard into the sightscreen, he's made a mockery of this chase
pushed off the front foot to long off
defends off a thick outside edge to short third man
full into the pads, worked to midwicket
guides a back of a length ball to point
Malinga too much leg side with the attempted yorkers, and Gayle picks up one more in front of square leg
just outside off on a good length, Bravo right forward to defend
tries the slower yorker, it hits the pad, but outside leg, and rolls fine, appeal is turned down
Bravo goes after Malinga, steps forward and hits him over extra cover, it is picked up just inside the boundary
tossed up ball on leg stump, nudged to midwicket
pushes a length ball to extra cover
overpitched on leg stump, Gayle whips it in front of square leg, in the air, and in the gap too
turns in from middle, he lunges forward and nudges to midwicket
straight and down the leg side
faster one from round the stumps, Gayle punches hard past the bowler to long off
makes some room and steers a quicker one past slip
angled in from round the stumps and hits the pad outside leg
yorker, off and middle stump, Gayle digs it back without fuss
squeezes a very full one out to third man
reaches well forward and pushes crisply to cover
Bravo goes over cover this time, too wide the pitched up ball from Malinga, and Bravo reaches out to hit it over the infield
moves away slightly from a good length, left alone
moves forward and defends to cover
fired in quick to the pads, in the air for some time as he turns it square, moves to 99
that is quick down the leg side and everyone has missed it, brushes the keeper's forearm and runs away
worked to midwicket
defends a full delivery, thick inside edge runs to short fine leg
drives a tossed up ball to mid off
full and quick on the pads, played out
opens the face to a length ball on middle and leg and runs it to point
pitched up on leg, knocked back to the bowler

this could have been close, but mid off failed to pick the ball up cleanly even as Gayle did a rare sprint for the single, 21st ODI hundred for him, the horns blow louder at Sabina Park, Gayle hugs Bravo jr, and then gets down on his knees, arms aloft, what a showman
overpitched and Bravo flays it between extra cover and mid off
Gayle has to do another sprint now, for his partner, who runs a length ball in front of point and takes off, another botched pick-up in the field, would have been tight otherwise
yorker, on middle stump, Gayle gets legs out of the way, and bat in the way
worked through square leg
outside edge pops up and falls short of point as this spins across from outside leg
full delivery knocked back to the bowler
pushed down the track
nothing can go wrong for Gayle today, hits out at a tossed up ball, edge falls safely over cover, and before the incoming sweeper
full and wide outside off, left alone
wide again, this time Gayle stretches and carves it wide of the sweeper
good length ball on middle, defended
bouncer surprises Bravo, he does well to weave inside the line just in time
beaten on the square-drive with one too close to him, ball bounces in front of the keeper
drops a short ball awkwardly into the ground square on the leg side
tossed up ball on the leg stump nudged fine
driven down to long off
whips a tossed up full ball to deep square leg
not that short, but he's swivelled and launched it over the man at deep square leg
just outside off, and flashed hard to backward point
Gayle departs finally, tried to slog-sweep a tossed up ball out of sight, Chandimal judges the steepling top edge and takes it at forward square leg
some width for Bravo and he smashes it through the small gap between cover and extra cover with a big followthrough
pushes firmly down the pitch and takes one in front of mid off
Samuels gets four first ball, softly thick edges a good length ball to the fine third man rope
what a way to go, Bravo was racing for the single as Samuels drove to mid on, Malinga got rid of the ball quickly, and Kula whipped the bails off, Bravo was stranded mid sea
appeal for leg before as Kula gets it move in, turned down, came in very sharply, and hit him above the knee roll, ball tracker says it was going over
defends a tossed up ball off the front foot
takes a step out and allows it to hit pad outside leg
punched off the back foot wide of backward point
lunges forward to defend to cover
full delivery, he pushes back to the bowler
angled in full, turned to midwicket
plays out a length ball on off stump to point
is too late on the pull and the short ball rolls towards point
worked behind square leg

Kula's got an lbw appeal ruled in his favour, far closer ones have been turned down today, the tall Pollard was on the walk, and was hit above the knee roll, he cannot believe it, replays show Pollard was also struck outside the line of off, what a howling howler from Pollard's fellow Trinidadian Joel Wilson
right forward to defend a good length ball to extra cover
played out to midwicket
punched off the back foot to the bowler
comes down the track and defends
turns it off the pad wide of short fine but not enough in it to beat the man
lunges forward and defends a bouncing delivery
Bravo moves forward, plays that wristy flick over midwicket and picks up four
defended off the front foot
turned to square leg off the pad
tosses it up, Samuels comes out and drives but cannot beat extra cover
flatter one, pushed back to the bowler
comes down, is beaten by a straighter one, it pops up in the air, Mendis goes for it with a dive, could have been an inside edge
misses the cut as this one skids on low outside off
hit on the pad as he leaves the crease
tossed up, pushed back to the bowler
outside leg stump from over the wicket, and Bravo drills a powerful sweep past short fine leg
worked to midwicket
nice, tossed up, on leg stump, and turns past the outside edge
leans forward to work it to midwicket
backs away outside leg late and punches hard but straight to extra cover
Samuels dances out again and connects this time against Mendis, carting against the turn just over the deep midwicket rope
presses forward to defend a tossed up ball outside off stump
looked to jump out, stayed back and steered to backward point
flighted ball defended behind point
Samuels skips out and lashes it straight back to the bowler, who tries to help it onto the non-striker's stumps and misses, that will do it
